titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 314 Lennon Drive in Wilmington, North Carolina, as the "Meadowlark Lemon Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 7/29/2014--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 314 Lennon Drive in Wilmington, North Carolina, as the "Meadowlark Lemon Post Office."
